nodes.text: Moll was a hot rock planet with no moons. It was located in the Rannon system, a part of the Instrop sector in the Slice portion of the Outer Rim Territories. The planet occupied the closest orbit to its star, the yellow-white Rannon.

Moll was first mentioned in the 1993 Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game supplement Wanted by Cracken, which was written by Louis J. Prosperi for West End Games. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Rannon system, and therefore Moll, in grid square T-17.
